title: All the Time, Always
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Kayochin, Kayochin! Let’s go hang out after school today since there’s no club meeting! Rin wants to go see a movie that Shizuku-chan recommended, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Okay, sure!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>.......Ah! But Rin...... already used up this month’s allowance......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>How about we go chit-chat at the park? I still have some tea left in my bottle.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Chatting in the park, didn’t we already do that all the time during summer break......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh? But I really love chatting with you at the park, Rin-chan. You don’t love it too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Oh, yeah! Rin loves it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, I’m glad to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then, I want to get your advice for my superhero entrance line, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Superhero entrance line......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin and Setsuna-san were thinking of cool superhero entrance lines, nya! Mine is, “Rushing like the wind! I’m Rin, the Yellow Cat!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
